author: Al Jazeera
title: Congo's ex-president Yhombi-Opango dies of coronavirus
description: Yhombi-Opango, who was ill before contracting the virus, has died in a Paris hospital, according to his family.
content:
Jacques Joaquim Yhombi-Opango, former president of the Republic of the Congo, has died after contracting coronavirus, his family said.
Yhombi-Opango died in a Paris hospital on Monday. He was 81.
More:
Yhombi-Opango was ill before he contracted the virus, … [+1105 chars]

author: Yinka Adegoke
title: African economies are being burdened with commodities-linked debt even as prices tumble
description: Institutions like the World Bank are worried about the lack of transparency of resource-backed loans especially for oil producers
content:
Last month World Banks managing director David Malpass expressed concern about the amount of debt some of Africas economies were piling on. In particular, he worried about the lack of transparency in some of the loan deals being struck with China.

description: [Premium Times] The family of a former President of the Republic of Congo, Jacques Yhombi-Opango, has confirmed his death from the Coronavirus disease on Monday, in a Paris hospital.
content:
The family of a former President of the Republic of Congo, Jacques Yhombi-Opango, has confirmed his death from the Coronavirus disease on Monday, in a Paris hospital.
